properties.areaDesc: Madison; Onondaga; Southern Oneida; Northern Oneida
properties.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued February 19 at 1:27PM EST until February 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow
accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Snowfall rates may reach 1 to
2 inches per hour at times early Thursday morning.

* WHERE...Northern Oneida, Onondaga, Madison and Southern Oneida
counties. The heaviest snow will develop along and north of
the Thruway from Jordan to Utica...and south of Camden and
Rome NY.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads will become
snow covered very quickly. Heavy snowfall rates will create
very poor visibility as well. The hazardous conditions could
impact the morning commute along the I-90 corridor and into
the Syracuse metro area.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
HazardType: Heavy Lake Effect Snow, Lake Effect Snow
